locations.name: Route 300-709 Intersection
locations.description:
Rin stops here and checks the time
                                                                                    while showing us a great view of Mt.
                                                                                    Fuji.

locations.name: Sleeping Nadeshiko and Waiting Shed
locations.description:
Rin first encounters Nadeshiko
                                                                                    sleeping here, on a bench in the
                                                                                    waiting shed.

locations.name: Lake Motosu Camp Check-in Building
locations.description:
This is where Rin checks in for the
                                                                                    Lake Motosu Campsite. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Path to Lake Motosu Campsite
locations.description:
Rin rides her bike down here to the
                                                                                    lakeside. Nadeshiko also chases a
                                                                                    scared Rin down the path later that
                                                                                    night.

locations.name: Lake Motosu Campground Washing Area
locations.description:
Rin cycles through this area as she
                                                                                    heads to the lakeside.

locations.name: Rin Lake Motosu Tent Location
locations.description:
Rin pitches her tent here beside Lake
                                                                                    Motosu.

locations.name: Rin Lake Motosu Firewood Location
locations.description:
Rin gathers pinecones and firewood in
                                                                                    this forested area.

locations.name: Utsubuna Station Line Bridge
locations.description:
Nadeshiko cycles through this bridge
                                                                                    on the way to Utsubuna Station from
                                                                                    her home.

locations.name:
Old Building Shimobe ES & JHS
                                                                                    (Motosu High School)
locations.description:
This is where the main protagonists
                                                                                    go to school! Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

episode: Welcome to the Outdoor Activities Club!

locations.name: Fumotoppara Campground
locations.description:
Known as Fumoto Campgrounds in the
                                                                                    anime, this is where Rin went solo
                                                                                    camping during a cold, windy day.
                                                                                    Nadeshiko catches up with her after
                                                                                    learning from Ena that Rin was
                                                                                    camping here. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Fumotoppara Campground Rin Tent
                                                                                    Location
locations.description:
This is the spot where Rin set up
                                                                                    camp at the Fumutoppara Campground.

locations.name:
Fumotoppara Campground False Comfort
                                                                                    Rooms Location
locations.description:
Rin thought that this was the comfort
                                                                                    rooms of the campgrounds.

locations.name:
Fumotoppara Campground Real Comfort
                                                                                    Rooms Location
locations.description:
This is where the real toilet is
                                                                                    after Rin misttok the previous
                                                                                    location for the comfort rooms.

locations.name:
Fumotoppara Campground Face-like
                                                                                    Building
locations.description:
Rin takes a photo of this building
                                                                                    while strolling at the campgrounds.

locations.name: Upside-down Mt. Fuji
locations.description:
Rin took a photo of Mt. Fuji with
                                                                                    it's upside-down reflection using
                                                                                    the surface of the pond.

episode: Mount Fuji and Relaxed Hot Pot Camp

locations.name: Selva Food Market
locations.description:
Known as Zebra Supermarket in the
                                                                                    series, this supermarket is the
                                                                                    basis of the supermarket where Aoi
                                                                                    works part-time. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Kawamoto Liquors
locations.description:
This building is the basis of the
                                                                                    liquor shop where Chiaki works
                                                                                    part-time. It was painted with the
                                                                                    name of the building in the anime
                                                                                    for promotion but it does not
                                                                                    actually sell liquor.

episode: Mount Fuji and Relaxed Hot Pot Camp

locations.name:
Former Shimobecho Flood Control
                                                                                    Warehouse
locations.description:
This is where Rin's home is located
                                                                                    in the anime. It is a closed down
                                                                                    flood control warehouse.

locations.name: 7451 Tokiwa
locations.description:
This is the model for Rin's house. It
                                                                                    is a former restaurant.

locations.name: Yamanashishi Station
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki meet for the first camping
                                                                                    trip of the Outdoor Activities Club.
                                                                                    Nadeshiko was late.

locations.name: Bridge to Fuefukigawa Fruit Park
locations.description:
Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki walked
                                                                                    down this bridge on the way to
                                                                                    Fuefukigawa Fruit Park. Chiaki tries
                                                                                    to hitch a ride at the intersection
                                                                                    East of the river as the long walk
                                                                                    starts to tire her out.

locations.name: Fuefukigawa Fruit Park
locations.description:
Known as Fuefuki Park in the series,
                                                                                    this park is the destination of
                                                                                    Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki who
                                                                                    walked from Yamanashi City Station
                                                                                    not knowing there is a bus that goes
                                                                                    to the park from the station.

locations.name: Fruit Cafe Hachinka+
locations.description:
Known as Orchard Kitchen in the
                                                                                    series, this is the cafe where
                                                                                    Nadeshiko bought vanilla ice cream,
                                                                                    Aoi bought a parfait, and Chiaki
                                                                                    bought a violet sundae (possibly
                                                                                    blueberry). Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Korobokkuru Hutte
locations.description:
This is where Rin took a break in her
                                                                                    journey and whaled on a Borscht Set
                                                                                    with a Caramel Macchiato. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Hottarakashi Onsen
locations.description:
This is the onsen where Nadeshiko,
                                                                                    Aoi, and Chiaki visited. They
                                                                                    overslept in the resting area after
                                                                                    a bath so watch out since it can
                                                                                    happen to you too!

locations.name: Kirigamine Camera
locations.description:
This is where the actual live camera
                                                                                    for the road on Mt. Kirigamine is
                                                                                    located. Rin waved here to show
                                                                                    Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki where she
                                                                                    was.

locations.name: Road to the Abandoned Onsen
locations.description:
This is where Rin's unfortunate
                                                                                    journey to the abandoned onsen
                                                                                    starts.

locations.name: Onsen Sign
locations.description:
This is the sign that marks the
                                                                                    entrance to the abandoned onsen.

locations.name: Unnamed Onsen
locations.description:
Known as the Takabotchi Mineral
                                                                                    Spings in the series, this onsen is
                                                                                    still standing, but the area has
                                                                                    been blocked off from the access
                                                                                    road.

locations.name: Japanese Alps Panoramic Lookout
locations.description:
This is Rin's first stop after coming
                                                                                    back from the disappointing onsen
                                                                                    journey. The weather wasn't great on
                                                                                    this side of the mountain and cloud
                                                                                    cover obstructed her view of the
                                                                                    landscape.

locations.name: Trail to Mt. Takabotchi Peak
locations.description:
Moving on from the Panoramic Lookout,
                                                                                    she heads towards the peak of Mt.
                                                                                    Takabotchi.

locations.name: Peak of Mt. Takabotchi
locations.description:
Rin arrives to the peak and notices
                                                                                    that there were no clouds covering
                                                                                    this side of the mountain, giving a
                                                                                    clear view to the town below. Rin took a night photo of the town
                                                                                    this spot overlooks and shared it
                                                                                    with Nadeshiko. This location is a
                                                                                    must for photographers!

locations.name: Mt. Takabotchi Vending Machine
locations.description:
Rin wanders here while going around
                                                                                    the place.

locations.name: Mt. Takabotchi Campground
locations.description:
Rin wanders here while going around
                                                                                    the place.

locations.name: Mt. Takabotchi Antenna Station
locations.description:
Rin wanders here while going around
                                                                                    the place.

locations.name: Mt. Takabotchi Pasture
locations.description:
Rin wanders here while going around
                                                                                    the place.

locations.name: Mt. Takabotchi Rin Tent Location
locations.description:
Rin wanders here while going around
                                                                                    the place.

locations.name: Pine Wood Auto Camping Ground
locations.description:
This marker points at the exact place
                                                                                    that Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki
                                                                                    pitched their tent and ate their
                                                                                    curry for dinner.

locations.name: Lovers' Sanctuary
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko took a photo
                                                                                    of the town below and sent it to Rin
                                                                                    during the night. Single otakus beware!

locations.name: Takashima Castle
locations.description:
Rin passes through here after her
                                                                                    solo camp on Mt. Takabotchi.

locations.name: Katakurakan Day Spa
locations.description:
This is the place where Shimarin took
                                                                                    a bath after missing out on the
                                                                                    onsen fun that Nadeshiko's group
                                                                                    had.

episode: Meat and Fall Colors and the Mystery Lake

locations.name: Suimeiso Camping Ground
locations.description:
This is the place where Rin and
                                                                                    Nadeshiko went camping by Lake
                                                                                    Shibire. The campsites are opposite
                                                                                    of this building and you can rent a
                                                                                    boat to ride across the lake if you
                                                                                    fancy it. There are no electric eels
                                                                                    in the lake. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

episode: A Night on the Lake Shore and Campers

locations.name:
Suimeiso Rin and Nadeshiko Tent
                                                                                    Location
locations.description:
This is where Rin's unfortunate
                                                                                    journey to the abandoned onsen
                                                                                    starts.

locations.name: Suimeiso Toba Sisters Tent Location
locations.description:
This is where Rin and Nadeshiko first
                                                                                    met Toba-sensei and her sister.

locations.name: Nadeshiko-Mt. Fuji Lookout Point
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko was standing
                                                                                    while looking at Mt. Fuji. It's only
                                                                                    possible to see Mt. Fuji on a clear
                                                                                    day.

locations.name: Shimizu-Mt. Fuji View
locations.description:
This is the view that Nadeshiko
                                                                                    missed while she was sleeping at the
                                                                                    car. Missing this view of Mt. Fuji
                                                                                    led her to cycle to Lake Motosu and
                                                                                    meet Rin by chance.

locations.name: Hadakajima Station
locations.description:
This is Aoi and Chiaki's stop when
                                                                                    they go to work at the Zebra
                                                                                    Supermarket and the Kawamoto Liquor
                                                                                    shop.

locations.name: Minobu Station
locations.description:
This is Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki
                                                                                    leave the train as they head towards
                                                                                    the Caribou Outdoor Shop.

locations.name: Yutakaya Store
locations.description:
This is a store that Nadeshiko passed
                                                                                    by when they arrived at Minobu. They
                                                                                    even have a Houtou menu here which
                                                                                    was the food Nadeshiko saw on a
                                                                                    banner outside the store. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Eishodo
locations.description:
This is the place where Nadeshiko,
                                                                                    Aoi, and Chiaki bought Minobu
                                                                                    Manjuus. All three of them went back
                                                                                    for seconds so make sure to buy
                                                                                    enough! Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Minobu Bun Bench
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki sat down and ate the Minobu
                                                                                    Manjuus they bought.

episode:
A Night of Navigator Nadeshiko and Hot
                                                            Spring Steam

locations.name: Lawson Minami Alps Kaido Shop
locations.description:
This is where Rin stops to answer
                                                                                    Nadeshiko's call.

locations.name: First Yashajin Pass Bridge
locations.description:
This bridge is the model of tha
                                                                                    bridge that Rin crosses at the base
                                                                                    of Minami Alps.

locations.name: First Yashajin Pass Bridge Sign
locations.description:
Rin looks at this sign and was
                                                                                    astounded by the name of the pass
                                                                                    she was headed to.

locations.name: Second Yashajin Pass Bridge
locations.description:
This Red Arch bridge is the second
                                                                                    bridge seen as Rin makes her way
                                                                                    through Yashajin Pass.

locations.name: Ashiyasu Onsen Iwazonokan
locations.description:
Rin passes through these onsen
                                                                                    buildings as she drives through
                                                                                    Yashajin Pass. The capture point is on the road
                                                                                    across the river!

locations.name: Yashajin Pass Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is where Rin found out that the
                                                                                    road up ahead cannot be used by
                                                                                    private vehicles. There may be wild animals such as
                                                                                    bears in the area! Please be
                                                                                    cautious of your surroundings!

locations.name: Yashagami Hutte
locations.description:
This is where Rin got a drink from a
                                                                                    vending machine as she takes a break
                                                                                    after finding out about the
                                                                                    restricted road. There may be wild animals such as
                                                                                    bears in the area! Please be
                                                                                    cautious of your surroundings! Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Minami Alps Mt. Houou Hikers Hut
locations.description:
This is where Rin rests and meets
                                                                                    Subaru-san the Tea Lady who was
                                                                                    waiting for her companion that ran
                                                                                    late. There may be wild animals such as
                                                                                    bears in the area! Please be
                                                                                    cautious of your surroundings!

locations.name: Minami Alps Mt. Houou Mountain Trail
locations.description:
This is where Rin sees Subaru-san off
                                                                                    and was given tea. There may be wild animals such as
                                                                                    bears in the area! Please be
                                                                                    cautious of your surroundings!

locations.name:
Tsuetsuki Pass Observation Cafe Kaze
                                                                                    no Uta
locations.description:
This is where Rin was when Nadeshiko
                                                                                    asked for her location. It's
                                                                                    directly south of Lake Suwa and
                                                                                    there is an observation deck nearby. They are only open from April to the
                                                                                    end of November. Opening hours:
                                                                                    10:00 - 15:00 (Closed on
                                                                                    Wednesdays).

locations.name: Senjoujiki Curl
locations.description:
This mountainous area was one of the
                                                                                    places that Nadeshiko suggested
                                                                                    though Rin didn't actually come to
                                                                                    this place. The northeast direction
                                                                                    fromt this spot has the same area of
                                                                                    the curl used in the anime.

locations.name: Mushroom Kingdom
locations.description:
This place was one of the places that
                                                                                    Nadeshiko suggested though Rin
                                                                                    didn't actually come to this place.
                                                                                    It is a ski resort in the winter and
                                                                                    a mushroom kingdom on warmer
                                                                                    seasons. They are open from April 25 - May 31,
                                                                                    10:00 - 16:00 with last admission at
                                                                                    15:30. They are closed on Thursdays.
                                                                                    (Subject to change if Thursday is a
                                                                                    national holiday.)

locations.name: Hoshakuzan Kozenji Temple
locations.description:
This is the temple where Rin stops
                                                                                    by. It is famous for it's legendary
                                                                                    dog, which is the reason why Rin
                                                                                    visited the place. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Hayatarou Grave
locations.description:
This is where Rin pays her respects
                                                                                    for the hero dog that the temple
                                                                                    enshrines.

locations.name: Kozenji Temple Building
locations.description:
In the series, this part of the
                                                                                    temple is where Rin bought one of
                                                                                    the cute dog fortunes and got one
                                                                                    that says small luck.

locations.name:
Hayataro Onsen Komakusa-no-yu Hot
                                                                                    Spring
locations.description:
This is where Rin rests and grabs a
                                                                                    bottle of tea after visiting the
                                                                                    Kozenji Temple. She oversleeps out
                                                                                    of exhaustion from her trip.

locations.name: FamilyMart Uwabukita
locations.description:
Rin bought a juicy pork bun from here
                                                                                    as she headed to the campgrounds.

locations.name: Mount Jinbagata Road Stop Sign
locations.description:
Rin sees a stop sign at the side of
                                                                                    the road and stops. She is later
                                                                                    told by Chiaki that the sign was
                                                                                    just left there and that the road is
                                                                                    apssable. She then gets off her
                                                                                    moped and walks to the campground.

locations.name: Mount Jinbagata Campground
locations.description:
This is the campground where Rin
                                                                                    arrives late after oversleeping at
                                                                                    the Hayataro Onsen.

locations.name: Mount Jinbagata Rin Tent Location
locations.description:
This is where Rin pitched her tent in
                                                                                    the Jinbagatayama Campground.

locations.name: Mount Jinbagata Summit Observatory
locations.description:
This is where Rin sat down on her low
                                                                                    chair and cooked her juicy pork bun
                                                                                    that she bought from the convenience
                                                                                    store.

locations.name: Mount Fuji YMCA Global Eco Village
locations.description:
This is where Rin, Nadeshiko, Aoi,
                                                                                    Ena, and Toba-sensei had their
                                                                                    christmas camp!

locations.name: Mt. Fuji YMCA Tent Location
locations.description:
This is where the campers pitched
                                                                                    their tent in the campgrounds.

locations.name: Natura Vita
locations.description:
This is the cafe of the Makaino
                                                                                    Farm.
                                                                                    This is the place where
                                                                                    Aoi
                                                                                        and Chiaki ate dessert
                                                                                    
                                                                                    while Rin, Nadeshiko, and
                                                                                    Toba-sensei were at the campgrounds. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Fujisan World Heritage Center
locations.description:
This is where the first stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. It is a center built around
                                                                                    Mt. Fuji and it's geography.
                                                                                    Nadeshiko
                                                                                        bought a blue Mt. Fuji Curry
                                                                                    ,
                                                                                    Aoi
                                                                                        bought a dessert of sorts
                                                                                    , meanwhile
                                                                                    Chiaki
                                                                                        bought Lava Fried Chicken
                                                                                    . Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Fujisan World Heritage Center Mt.
                                                                                    Fuji Capture Point
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki wanted to view Mt. Fuji but
                                                                                    due to unfavorable weather, it was
                                                                                    hidden behind a fog. The view is amazing if you can get
                                                                                    the timing with the weather right.

locations.name: Kawaguchiko Bridge
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, and Chiaki rode
                                                                                    their bikes rather slowly as fatigue
                                                                                    was getting to them. Nadeshiko
                                                                                    offered to ride ahead and go back to
                                                                                    the bridge but changed her mind
                                                                                    after they were inspired by bikers
                                                                                    who sped past through them.

locations.name: Oishi Park Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki parked their bikes after
                                                                                    crossing the Kawaguchiko Bridge.

locations.name: Small Mt. Fuji Made of Rock
locations.description:
This is a miniature Mt. Fuji where
                                                                                    the bikers from earlier who passed
                                                                                    them at the Kawaguchiko Bridge asks
                                                                                    Aoi to take a photo of them posing
                                                                                    with the monument.

locations.name:
Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
                                                                                    Chairs and Table Capture Point
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Inuko. and
                                                                                    Chiaki were given oranges in
                                                                                    exchange for taking photos of the
                                                                                    biker couple. The couple also showed
                                                                                    them their photo album and told them
                                                                                    about their history of biking to
                                                                                    places together.

locations.name:
Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
                                                                                    Greenhouse Capture Point
locations.description:
Face the greenhouse while including a
                                                                                    bit of the pathway in the frame and
                                                                                    take a photo!

locations.name: Kawaguchiko Natural Living Center
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki parked their bikes after
                                                                                    crossing the Kawaguchiko Bridge.

locations.name: Mt. Fuji Panoramic Ropeway
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki rode a cable car to reach
                                                                                    Kawaguchiko Tenjoyama Park.

locations.name: Kawaguchiko Tenjoyama Park
locations.description:
This is where the third stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. In the series, it was
                                                                                    located in a caf called
                                                                                    Tanuki-Kissa.

locations.name:
Kawaguchiko Tenjozan Park Mt. Fuji
                                                                                    Capture Point
locations.description:
The capture point id located at the
                                                                                    roof top of the building. Face Mt.
                                                                                    Fuji and take a photo.

locations.name:
Kawaguchiko Tenjozan Park Tanuki and
                                                                                    Rabbit Statues
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Inuko, and
                                                                                    Chiaki took photos of the statues.
                                                                                    These characters came from a story
                                                                                    that was told in the first half of
                                                                                    the episode.

episode: Both of Us, Back in the Day

locations.name: Weeping Cherry Blossoms of Hounkaku
locations.description:
This is where the fourth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located.

locations.name: Nambu Fire Festival Grounds
locations.description:
This is where the fifth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. Inuko and Chiaki first met
                                                                                    here and became friends. This is
                                                                                    also where the Nambu Fire Festival
                                                                                    happens too.

locations.name: Nambu Drink Machine Station
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Inuko, and
                                                                                    Chiaki got some drinks after
                                                                                    checking out the bridge and the Fire
                                                                                    Festival grounds.

locations.name: Shimobe Bridge
locations.description:
This is where the fifth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located.

locations.name: Shimobe Golden Foot Bath
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki relaxed after getting their
                                                                                    stamp at the Shimobe Bridge. Aoi was
                                                                                    telling one of her tall tales when a
                                                                                    tourist overheard her and wanted to
                                                                                    hear more of her stories.

locations.name: New Umezuki
locations.description:
Nadeshiko, Aoi, and Chiaki each
                                                                                    bought a hidden wafer sandwich from
                                                                                    the store and ate them at the bench
                                                                                    located at the right side of
                                                                                    building. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Road Station Nanbu
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko, Aoi, and
                                                                                    Chiaki where they realized that the
                                                                                    general depiction of Mt. Fuji on
                                                                                    merchandise is a view that can only
                                                                                    be seen in Yamanashi.

locations.name: Nanbu Yorokobi Tea Restaurant
locations.description:
This is where the sixth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. This is where Nadeshiko,
                                                                                    Aoi, and Chiaki met Ena who was
                                                                                    eating at the restaurant. They
                                                                                    wanted to eat Tuna Bowls but found
                                                                                    out that they don't have the money
                                                                                    for it.

locations.name: Toba Sisters Table Capture Point
locations.description:
This is where the Toba sisters sat
                                                                                    while Minami was drinking wine from
                                                                                    Yamanashi and Shizuoka. Include the
                                                                                    striped path and the small underpass
                                                                                    in the distance when taking a photo.

locations.name: Narusawa Ice Cave
locations.description:
This is where the seventh stamp of
                                                                                    the Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. Rin caught up with
                                                                                    Nadeshiko and gave her the Yamanashi
                                                                                    Lake Stamp Rally pamphlet that Rin's
                                                                                    grandfather found after Nadeshiko
                                                                                    lost it somewhere. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Swings Near Hachiman Shrine Capture
                                                                                    Point
locations.description:
This is where the eight stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located.

locations.name: Seishu Park
locations.description:
This is where the ninth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located.

locations.name: Mitama Hot Spring
locations.description:
This is where the tenth stamp of the
                                                                                    Yamanashi Lake Stamp Rally is
                                                                                    located. This is also the last
                                                                                    destination and where Nadeshiko
                                                                                    found out that the entire rally was
                                                                                    just an event that both Aoi and
                                                                                    Chiaki made up for her.

locations.name: Spatio Kobuchisawa Hotel
locations.description:
This is a hotel with an onsen where
                                                                                    Rin went through the process of
                                                                                    using the sauna, a cold bath, and
                                                                                    the hot onsen water multiple times
                                                                                    as recommended by Ena.

locations.name: Japanese Restaurant Takaoka
locations.description:
Shimarin bought a tempura set meal
                                                                                    here before heading to the
                                                                                    supermarket for camping supplies.

locations.name: Himawari Market
locations.description:
This is where Rin bought camping
                                                                                    supplies for her camp with a
                                                                                    three-wheeled scooter.

episode: Curry Noodles Are the Best Travel Companion

locations.name: Old Furuseki Post Office
locations.description:
This former post office building is
                                                                                    the model building for Takeda's
                                                                                    Bookstore where Rin works part-time.

locations.name: Minobu Post Office
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko works
                                                                                    part-time to earn money for her
                                                                                    camping equipment. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Minobu Post Office Side Entrance
locations.description:
This is where Ena exits the post
                                                                                    office building with Nadeshiko
                                                                                    waiting for her outside the
                                                                                    entrance. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Minobu Riverside Lunch Spot
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko and Ena ate
                                                                                    their lunch while chatting.

locations.name: Nadeshiko Minobu Cycle Bridge
locations.description:
Nadeshiko drove through this bridge
                                                                                    as she was delivering mail. Take a photo facing the West or
                                                                                    Upstream part of the river to get a
                                                                                    similar photo from the anime.

locations.name: Takayama Capture Point
locations.description:
Aoi and Akari walked through these
                                                                                    streets in a cutscene. Face the Southern part of the road
                                                                                    from this point to get a photo
                                                                                    similar to the anime frame.

locations.name: New Furuseki Post Office
locations.description:
Rin gathers pinecones and firewood in
                                                                                    this forested area.

locations.name:
Kikuya Store Furuseki Intersection
                                                                                    Capture Point
locations.description:
This is the second recognizable point
                                                                                    in Rin's New Year's solo camping
                                                                                    trip. Face the intesection from this point
                                                                                    to get a photo similar to the anime
                                                                                    frame.

locations.name: Tokiwa River Bridge
locations.description:
Rin drives through this bridge early
                                                                                    morning on her New Year's solo
                                                                                    camping trip. The capture point is at the southern
                                                                                    side of the river. You either have
                                                                                    to be creative or get a drone for
                                                                                    the shot.

locations.name:
Minobu Line-Route 300 Rail
                                                                                    Intersection Capture Point
locations.description:
This is the fourth recognizable point
                                                                                    in Rin's New Year's solo camping
                                                                                    trip. Face the North side from this point
                                                                                    to take a photo similar to the anime
                                                                                    frame.

locations.name: Uenotaira Scenery
locations.description:
This scenery is the fifth
                                                                                    recognizable point in Rin's New
                                                                                    Year's solo camping trip. Face the East and include the distant
                                                                                    bridges when taking a photo to make
                                                                                    it similar to the anime frame.

locations.name: Fuji River Scenery
locations.description:
This is the sixth recognizable point
                                                                                    in Rin's New Year's solo camping
                                                                                    trip. Face the North while including the
                                                                                    bend and the river to get a photo
                                                                                    similar to the anime frame.

locations.name:
Utsubuna Station Line Bridge
                                                                                    Intersection
locations.description:
This is where Rin and Nadeshiko meet
                                                                                    up by chance as Nadeshiko was buying
                                                                                    snacks for break time while Rin was
                                                                                    driving to her New Year's solo
                                                                                    camping trip destination.

locations.name:
Omaezaki Lighthouse Observation
                                                                                    Platform
locations.description:
Rin's first stop on her solo camp
                                                                                    journey!

locations.name:
Omaezaki Platform Stairway to
                                                                                    Seaside
locations.description:
This is the staircase that Rin uses
                                                                                    to go to the seaside. Watch out for
                                                                                    dog paw prints on the steps and be
                                                                                    sure to capture them when you find
                                                                                    them!

locations.name: Kimikura
locations.description:
This is the place where Subaru-san,
                                                                                    the Tea Lady from Yashajin Pass
                                                                                    works. There is a green tea cafe in
                                                                                    the second floor of this place. The tea Rin bought is called
                                                                                    "Himekura". At the cafe, she bought
                                                                                    a matcha tiramizu and green tea set. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Mitsuke Tenjin Shrine
locations.description:
This is the shrime that Rin visits on
                                                                                    her New Year's Solo Camp. It is
                                                                                    related to the dog of the Hoshakuzan
                                                                                    Kozenji Temple that she visited in
                                                                                    Season 1, Episode 9.

locations.name: Ryuyokaiyo Koen Auto Camping Ground
locations.description:
This is the camping grounds Rin chose
                                                                                    for her New Years Solo Camping Trip. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Ryuyokaiyo Koen Auto Camping Ground
                                                                                    Rin Tent Location
locations.description:
This is where Rin pitched her tent
                                                                                    while camping in this camping
                                                                                    ground. The anime frame is panning
                                                                                    through this scene so it may be wise
                                                                                    to take a panoramic shot over a wide
                                                                                    angle shot from this point.

locations.name:
Ryuyo Shiosai Wind Power Plant
                                                                                    Kazaryu
locations.description:
This windmill is a very recognizable
                                                                                    feature in the anime and it's
                                                                                    possible to see it from the camping
                                                                                    grounds and the surrounding area.

locations.name: Ryuyokaiyo Koen Onsen Capture Point
locations.description:
Rin walks past the glass panel with
                                                                                    the onsen icon and the symbol
                                                                                    andcharacter. The lamp posts
                                                                                    separate the icon and the characters
                                                                                    in between.

locations.name: Ryuyokaiyo Koen Park Capture Point
locations.description:
Rin walks through this pathway as she
                                                                                    heads to the lighthouse. Face the
                                                                                    North-Northwest side of the pathwalk
                                                                                    and take a photo above your height
                                                                                    and with the frame tilted a little
                                                                                    to the left. A wide angle lens may
                                                                                    be needed for this shot.

locations.name:
Ryuyokaiyo Koen Seawall Capture
                                                                                    Point
locations.description:
Face the seawall from this direction
                                                                                    while includiing the tree in front
                                                                                    of the hedge and the tall tree at
                                                                                    the right.

locations.name: Kaketsuka Lighthouse Capture Point
locations.description:
Face the lighthouse from this
                                                                                    direction while including the
                                                                                    windmill in your shot.

locations.name: Kaketsuka Lighthouse
locations.description:
Rin stops here to take in the
                                                                                    beautiful scenery of the place. She
                                                                                    also saw a very small part of Mt.
                                                                                    Fuji from this location. It may be possible to see Mt. Fuji on
                                                                                    a very clear day.

locations.name: Fukudakaigan Parking Lot
locations.description:
Rin parks her moped in this area. It
                                                                                    was parked in front of a sign.

locations.name: Fukude Coast
locations.description:
During New Year's Eve, a Torii Gate
                                                                                    is erected on the beach. The Torii
                                                                                    gate on the beach is aligned with
                                                                                    the sunrise over the horizon, making
                                                                                    for an amazing photo for the New
                                                                                    Year. There may also be people giving out
                                                                                    mochi during New Years. Rin got a
                                                                                    lot.

locations.name: Mt. Minobu Ropeway Kuonji Station
locations.description:
This is the station at the lower part
                                                                                    of the mountain where Aoi, Akari,
                                                                                    Chiaki, and Toba-sensei used to get
                                                                                    to the temple at the upper part of
                                                                                    the mountain. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Mt. Minobu Ropeway Okunoin Station
locations.description:
This is the station at the upper part
                                                                                    of the mountain where Aoi, Akari,
                                                                                    Chiaki, and Toba-sensei used to get
                                                                                    to the temple at this side of the
                                                                                    mountain. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Mt. Minobu Observation Deck
locations.description:
This capture point has the Mt. Minobu
                                                                                    sign and viewing binoculars seen in
                                                                                    the anime.

locations.name: Staircase to Temple Capture Point
locations.description:
Facing the top, this place has the
                                                                                    same view as in the frame in the
                                                                                    anime.

locations.name: Kuonji Temple
locations.description:
This is the Temple where Aoi, Akari,
                                                                                    Chiaki, and Toba-sensei went for
                                                                                    their New Years shrine visit.

locations.name: pizza NAO
locations.description:
This is the store that owns the truck
                                                                                    where Rin bought pizza from. If the
                                                                                    truck is not at the campgrounds, you
                                                                                    can just come here and taste for
                                                                                    yourself. Rin ordered a Margherita and
                                                                                    pot-au-feu.

locations.name: Diamond Fuji Spot Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is the place where Toba-sensei
                                                                                    rushed to get to in order to witness
                                                                                    the Diamond Fuji event. The capture spot is just a few meters
                                                                                    south from this location.

episode: Surprise Camping and Some Deep Thoughts

locations.name:
Windmill and Small Bridge Capture
                                                                                    Point
locations.description:
This is where Rin drove through with
                                                                                    her moped as she moves to another
                                                                                    camping ground. Include the blue and
                                                                                    white sign, the two windmills
                                                                                    visible in the frame, and the convex
                                                                                    mirror below one of the electric
                                                                                    posts.

locations.name: Enshuo Bridge Capture Point
locations.description:
This is the point in Enshuo bridge
                                                                                    where Rin is seen driving on. Do not
                                                                                    capture the whole bridge. Just
                                                                                    include the two bridge piers from
                                                                                    the island across. A zoom lens may be needed for this
                                                                                    capture point.

locations.name: Minami Ward Route 150 Sign
locations.description:
This is the sign where Rin drives
                                                                                    under as she drives to another
                                                                                    campground.

locations.name:
Minami Ward Route 150 Field
                                                                                    Buildings
locations.description:
These buildings are the basis for the
                                                                                    building found in the anime along
                                                                                    Route 150.

locations.name:
Tokaido-Shinkansen Line 2.9-Meter
                                                                                    Tall Underpass
locations.description:
Rin drives through this spot on her
                                                                                    way to the Nagisaen Camping Grounds.

locations.name: Benten Bridge
locations.description:
Rin drives through this spot on her
                                                                                    way to the Nagisaen Camping Grounds.

locations.name: Nagisaen Camping Ground
locations.description:
This is where Rin camped for the
                                                                                    night to meet up with Nadeshiko the
                                                                                    next day.

locations.name: Nagisahashi Bridge Capture Point
locations.description:
This is where Rin drives through
                                                                                    after she checks in at the Nagisaen
                                                                                    Camping Grounds.

locations.name:
Hamamatsu City Maisaka Omotehama
                                                                                    Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is where Rin parks her moped to
                                                                                    visit the beach under the Hamanao
                                                                                    Bridge.

locations.name: Hamanao Bridge Pathway
locations.description:
This is the pathway Rin used to get
                                                                                    to the beach.

locations.name: Under the Hamanao Bridge
locations.description:
Take a photo if the pylon across the
                                                                                    water from this location.

locations.name: Ima-Kiriguchi Maisaka Tsutsumi
locations.description:
This is where Rin sets up her low
                                                                                    chair and reads a book.

locations.name: Lake Hamana Imakiri Red Light Stand
locations.description:
This location was seen in a cutscene
                                                                                    from the anime.

locations.name: Kaishunro
locations.description:
This is where Rin took a bath after
                                                                                    visiting the Hamanao Bridge.

locations.name: Bentenjima Red Torii Gate
locations.description:
This is the Torii gate where Rin
                                                                                    watched the sun set over.

locations.name: Hamanako Bridge Capture Point
locations.description:
Rin drives through here as she heads
                                                                                    North to buy Ichigo Kirameki.

locations.name: Hamamatsu Street Sign Capture Point
locations.description:
This sign was featured in a cutscene
                                                                                    in the anime.

locations.name: Eel Restaurant Street Capture Point
locations.description:
The yellow building on the left was
                                                                                    seen as Rin walks through the street
                                                                                    filled with eel restaurants.

locations.name: Shibuki
locations.description:
The sign of this buiding was seen in
                                                                                    the anime as the temptation to Rin's
                                                                                    wallet. She didn't fall for it
                                                                                    though.

locations.name: Shizuka Confectionery Shop
locations.description:
This is the shop where Rin bought
                                                                                    Ichigo Kirameki. If you arrive
                                                                                    before they open, get a number to
                                                                                    reserve a spot before the product is
                                                                                    sold out! Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Fujitaya
locations.description:
Nadeshiko bought two cream bread-like
                                                                                    products from this shop before
                                                                                    proceeding to the nearby train
                                                                                    station. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Kiga Station
locations.description:
Nadeshiko rides a train here to the
                                                                                    Hamanako-Sakume Station.

locations.name: Hamanako-Sakume Station
locations.description:
This is where Rin and Nadeshiko met.
                                                                                    There are also lots of birds that
                                                                                    loiter in the station to the point
                                                                                    where you can see them from
                                                                                    satellite-based maps.

locations.name: Sakume
locations.description:
This is where your wallet will suffer
                                                                                    a violent death as Nadeshiko ordered
                                                                                    two top-grade unagi (eel) worth
                                                                                    4,000 each. Based on their
                                                                                    reactions, the price was worth the
                                                                                    meal. Even Rin said she'll return to
                                                                                    Laka Hamana just to eat the unagi. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Tenryu-Hamanako Railway Crossing
                                                                                    Capture Point
locations.description:
Face the North and take a photo of
                                                                                    the road under the Tomei Expressway.
                                                                                    Include the two poles directly to
                                                                                    the side of this point.

locations.name: Nadeshiko's Grandma's House
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko and her
                                                                                    Grandma lives! It's an empty lot in
                                                                                    real life though.

locations.name: Lake Hamana Observatory Ruins
locations.description:
This is where Rin, Nadeshiko, and
                                                                                    Ayano went at night to see the
                                                                                    amazing night view of the entire
                                                                                    Lake Hamana area. Unfortunately, the observatory has
                                                                                    been removed and only it's
                                                                                    foundations remain. Though you will
                                                                                    get a similar view if you use a
                                                                                    drone especially at night.

locations.name: Mt. Fuji Station
locations.description:
Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena arrives here,
                                                                                    for their Lake Yamanaka camping
                                                                                    trip. The Torii gate capture point is
                                                                                    located at the north entrance of the
