                                                                                    building.

locations.name: Hataorimachi Information Center
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Enagot
                                                                                    tickets to use the buses in the area
                                                                                    as much as they want for two days.

locations.name: Mt. Fuji Station Bus Stop
locations.description:
Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena rush to the bus
                                                                                    before they get left behind.

locations.name: Mt. Fuji Radar Dome Waystation
locations.description:
Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena arrive in this
                                                                                    waystation before going to Caribou.

locations.name: Montbell
locations.description:
This shop was the basis of the design
                                                                                    of the Caribou Outdoor Shop in the
                                                                                    Mt, Fuji Radar Dome Waystation.

locations.name:
Yamanakako Onsen Benifuji no Yu Hot
                                                                                    Spring
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena
                                                                                    had their bath on their camping
                                                                                    trip. Their open-air bath has a
                                                                                    great view of Mt. Fuji, though you
                                                                                    might not be able to bring a camera
                                                                                    in since it's a bath. Aoi and Chiaki bought Kinako Rice
                                                                                    Cake and Ice Cream while Ena bought
                                                                                    Matcha Ice Cream. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Ogino
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena
                                                                                    bought food to cook for the night at
                                                                                    the Lake Yamanaka Campgrounds. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Seria
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena
                                                                                    bought cooking tools for their camp
                                                                                    dinner.

locations.name: Misaki Campsite
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena
                                                                                    failed to spend the night in their
                                                                                    tent due to improper equipment
                                                                                    against the cold and not checking
                                                                                    the weather beforehand.

locations.name: Misaki Campsite Tent Location
locations.description:
This is where Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena
                                                                                    pitched their tents for the night.

locations.name: Misaki Cape Point
locations.description:
Aoi, Chiaki, and Ena relax here while
                                                                                    watching RC pilots fly their
                                                                                    aircraft.

locations.name: Nishi-Fujinomiya Station
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko got off and
                                                                                    heads towards to the Nadeshiko Torii
                                                                                    Mt. Fuji in Shizuoka Capture Point.

locations.name: Shimizu-ya Cafe
locations.description:
Rin bought mamemochi and amazake from
                                                                                    this cafe.

locations.name:
Nadeshiko Torii Mt. Fuji in Shizuoka
                                                                                    Capture Point
locations.description:
Take a photo on the left side of the
                                                                                    Torii gate and include the blocky
                                                                                    concrete marker and a thin metal
                                                                                    pole on the right of it. Mt. Fuji
                                                                                    ust be on the center with a small
                                                                                    offset to the right.

locations.name: Fujisan Hong Sengen Taisha
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko says her
                                                                                    prayers for her first solo camp to
                                                                                    be successful.

locations.name: Fujinomiya Yakisoba Antenna Shop
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko was lured
                                                                                    into after catching a sniff of
                                                                                    yakisoba from the Mt. Fuji in
                                                                                    Shizuoka Capture Point. She didn't fall for the temptation
                                                                                    and manages to proceed to the
                                                                                    Shigure-yaki/Gomoku Shigure store.

locations.name: Yushima's Great Cedar Tree
locations.description:
This is where Rin stops over during
                                                                                    her camping trip across Hayakawa.
                                                                                    She also spots a car similar to
                                                                                    Nadeshiko's sister not realizing it
                                                                                    was really Sakura's car.

locations.name: Okonomiyaki Restaurant Ito
locations.description:
Nadeshiko ordered a Gomoku
                                                                                    Shigure/Shigure-yaki and Oden from
                                                                                    the counter seat. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Naradanosato Hot Spring
locations.description:
This is where Rin stops by and
                                                                                    realizes that the cars she spotted
                                                                                    earlier was Sakura. She sneakily
                                                                                    follows Sakura but then gets spotted
                                                                                    after her phone vibrated. They both
                                                                                    talk about the Moped Journey show
                                                                                    and Nadeshiko going on her solo
                                                                                    camp.

locations.name: Fujikawa Station
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko leaves the
                                                                                    train and starts the long walk to
                                                                                    the campgrounds.

locations.name:
Nodayama Kenko Ryokuchi Park
                                                                                    Fujikawa Campground
locations.description:
This is the campground of Nadeshiko's
                                                                                    first solo camp. She meets and
                                                                                    offered two little campers some food
                                                                                    she cooked later that night.

locations.name:
Nodayama Kenko Ryokuchi Park
                                                                                    Fujikawa Campground Nadeshiko Tent
                                                                                    Location
locations.description:
This is the location where Nadeshiko
                                                                                    pitched her tent during her first
                                                                                    solo camp.

locations.name: Kaiun Tunnel
locations.description:
This is where Rin stops to take in
                                                                                    the wabi sabi aesthetic the tunnels
                                                                                    gave out as they were closed in the
                                                                                    anime.

locations.name: Villa Amehata Road Capture Point
locations.description:
Face the Northwest and take a photo
                                                                                    while including the small building
                                                                                    and the tall one.

locations.name:
Lake Amehata Suspension Bridge
                                                                                    Capture Point
locations.description:
Face the suspension bridge from this
                                                                                    point to get an image similar to the
                                                                                    anime.

locations.name: Lake Amehata Suspension Bridge
locations.description:
This is the suspension bridge that
                                                                                    Rin tries to cross thinking that the
                                                                                    bridge doesn't move much. Howver,
                                                                                    the middle parts rocks too much for
                                                                                    her taste and decides to head back
                                                                                    and and go to the onsen in Villa
                                                                                    Amehata.

locations.name: Yamato
locations.description:
This is where Sakura trues to buy
                                                                                    game food (bear, wild boar, etc.)
                                                                                    Sakura first considered a bear paw
                                                                                    but after realizing the complexity
                                                                                    of the dish, she opted for deer meat
                                                                                    instead.

locations.name: Villa Amehata
locations.description:
This is where Rin relaxes after she
                                                                                    tried to cross the Lake Amehata
                                                                                    Suspension Bridge.

episode: Winter's End and the Day of Departure

locations.name: 7-Eleven Inokashira
locations.description:
This is where Rin and her grandfather
                                                                                    stopped by and to grab a drink
                                                                                    before going on their separate ways.

locations.name: Mt. Fuji View Spot Nishiura Eri
locations.description:
Look at the direction of Mt. Fuji and
                                                                                    Cape Ose and take a picturesque
                                                                                    photo here!

locations.name: Floresta Yakushin
locations.description:
This forest has old trees that are
                                                                                    thought to be older than 1000 years
                                                                                    old. Due to it's rarity, it was
                                                                                    designated as a National Natural
                                                                                    Monument in 1952. and later on
                                                                                    selected as one of the 100 Best
                                                                                    Treasures of Numazu.

locations.name: Bench Near Cape Ose Kamike Pond
locations.description:
This is where Rin was feeding the
                                                                                    fishes. Be careful not to drop
                                                                                    anything in the lake.

locations.name: Osezaki Kamike Pond
locations.description:
Kamike Pond, located at the tip of
                                                                                    Cape Ose, is a freshwater pond
                                                                                    despite being close to the sea, and
                                                                                    is one of the Seven Mysteries of
                                                                                    Izu. The origin of the freshwater on the
                                                                                    lake is unknown. Many carps are
                                                                                    swarming in the pond. This is the first geospot featured in
                                                                                    the season and Rin's first geospot.

locations.name: Jouyama
locations.description:
This is one of the famous mountains
                                                                                    of Izu and it is formed by upthrusts
                                                                                    of magma from tectonic activity. This is the second geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and the first geospot
                                                                                    of Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Roadside Station Amagigoe
locations.description:
Aoi, Akari, Ena, and Chiaki bought
                                                                                    some wasabi ice cream while
                                                                                    Nadeshiko was asleep in the car.

locations.name: Kawazu Nanadaru Loop Bridge
locations.description:
This very unique bridge loops traffic
                                                                                    around twice in order to connect to
                                                                                    the road below as the sides of the
                                                                                    mountains are so steep that building
                                                                                    a road at the same height on both
                                                                                    sides is impossible.

locations.name: Ryugu Sea Cave
locations.description:
Rin walked down the staircase and
                                                                                    views the Ryugu Sea Cave from
                                                                                    inside. There is a promenade that overlooks
                                                                                    the Ryugu Sea Cave, allowing
                                                                                    visitors to observe this mysterious
                                                                                    sea cave from various locations. The
                                                                                    view of the Izu Islands in the
                                                                                    distance through the trees is also
                                                                                    beautiful. This is the third geospot featured in
                                                                                    the season and Rin's second geospot.

locations.name: Kawazuideyu Bridge
locations.description:
This is where Toba-sensei's group got
                                                                                    stuck in traffic due to the Kawazu
                                                                                    City Cherry Blossom Festival. Akari managed to buy some cherry
                                                                                    blossom steamed buns due to the
                                                                                    traffic buildup on the road.

locations.name: Madogahama Umiyu Park
locations.description:
This is where Rin enjoys a foot bath
                                                                                    while waiting for Toba-sensei's
                                                                                    group who got stuck in traffic
                                                                                    because of the Kawazu Cherry Blossom
                                                                                    Festival. This is also where they
                                                                                    meet up some time later.

locations.name: Madogahama Umiyu Park Foot Bath
locations.description:
This is where Rin sat down and got a
                                                                                    foot bath while looking at the
                                                                                    scenery surrounding the area.

locations.name: Ra-maru
locations.description:
This is where the group bought a
                                                                                    burger with sweet-and-spicy sauce,
                                                                                    camembert cheese, and fried
                                                                                    kinmedai. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Maxvalu Izushimoda Shop
locations.description:
Known in the anime as the Maxpower
                                                                                    Shop, this is where the group bought
                                                                                    their ingredients for their camp
                                                                                    dinner later in the night.

locations.name: Manpou Store
locations.description:
This is where Nadeshiko bought
                                                                                    Premium Shimoda Dried Alfonsino and
                                                                                    Toba-sensei bought spiny lobster for
                                                                                    Operation Shrimp as planned by
                                                                                    Chiaki. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name:
Cape Tsumeki Shimoda Ward
                                                                                    Information Shed
locations.description:
This is where Toba-sensei discovers
                                                                                    that the land owner has instituted
                                                                                    an all-year camping ban in the Cape
                                                                                    which ruined the inital plan to camp
                                                                                    in the area.

locations.name: Cape Tsumeki
locations.description:
This location is known for it's
                                                                                    daffodil colonies and it's
                                                                                    interesting rock formations. This is the fourth geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is Rin's fourth
                                                                                    geospot and the second geospot of
                                                                                    Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Cape Tsumeki Lighthouse
locations.description:
Chiaki took a photo of the rest of
                                                                                    the group (excluding Toba-sensei) at
                                                                                    the staircase of the lighthouse.
                                                                                    There are also strong gusts of wind
                                                                                    here.

locations.name: Cape Tsumeki Columnar Joints
locations.description:
This area is called "Tawaraiso Beach"
                                                                                    in the episode. The unique rock
                                                                                    formation was compared to a bunch of
                                                                                    hexagonal pencil heads without
                                                                                    erasers.

locations.name: Benches Overlooking Cape Tsumeki
locations.description:
The group sat down and drank some
                                                                                    Chunky Red Bean Soup while
                                                                                    Toba-sensei is trying to find other
                                                                                    suitable locations for camping out.

locations.name: Hiroi Liquor Store
locations.description:
This is the basis of the Iida Liquor
                                                                                    Store in the series. Toba-sensei
                                                                                    called the owner, Iida-san, to ask
                                                                                    help on looking for another campsite
                                                                                    as they cannot camp in Cape Tsumeki.
                                                                                    In Episode 13, the group visits the
                                                                                    place and meets up with them in
                                                                                    person and their pet, Choko, where
                                                                                    it was discovered that Ena is
                                                                                    starting to go through a Chikuwa
                                                                                    withdrawal.

locations.name: Kominato Daiichi Tunnel
locations.description:
This is a tunnel with a picturesque
                                                                                    view that the group drove through on
                                                                                    the way to the Izu Orange Center.

locations.name: Izu Orange Center
locations.description:
The group got some fresh orange
                                                                                    juices meanwhile Toba-sensei got a
                                                                                    bottle of Mandarin Wine.

locations.name: Hosono Plateau Tree House Village
locations.description:
The group passes through the place as
                                                                                    they head towards the Hosono Plateau
                                                                                    Observation Point.

locations.name: Hosono Plateau
locations.description:
The Hosono Plateau is part of Mount
                                                                                    Amagi, which erupted repeatedly
                                                                                    between 800,000 and 200,000 years
                                                                                    ago. This is the fifth geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is Rin's fifth
                                                                                    geospot and the third geospot of
                                                                                    Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Sansujiyama Lower Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is where the group parked their
                                                                                    vehicles on the Hosono Plateau as
                                                                                    they walked up to the Observation
                                                                                    Point.

locations.name: Bench Overlooking Hosono Plateau
locations.description:
This is where Rin, Aoi, and Ena sat
                                                                                    down and enjoyed the scenery while
                                                                                    Akari, Nadeshiko, and Chiaki race to
                                                                                    the Observation Point.

locations.name: Hosono Plateau Observation Point
locations.description:
This is where the group rests and
                                                                                    takes in the view from the Hosono
                                                                                    plateau.

locations.name: Seaside Hidden Hot Spring Seiryu
locations.description:
This is where the group relaxes with
                                                                                    a bath in the onsen with the view of
                                                                                    the Sanshiro Island in the sunset.

locations.name: Camp Koganezaki
locations.description:
This is the location that Iida-san
                                                                                    recommended to Toba-sensei after
                                                                                    discovering that their initial
                                                                                    camping ground of choice did not
                                                                                    allow camping.

locations.name: Cape Kogane Observation Deck
locations.description:
This is where Rin drove to early in
                                                                                    the morning while the rest of the
                                                                                    group was still asleep in their
                                                                                    tents. Cape Kogane is said to have one of
                                                                                    the best sunsets in Japan. This is the sixth geospot featured in
                                                                                    the season and it is Rin's sixth
                                                                                    geospot.

locations.name: Sawada Park Open-Air Bath
locations.description:
This is where Rin drove to early in
                                                                                    the morning while the rest of the
                                                                                    group was still asleep in their
                                                                                    tents. There is an open air bath here that
                                                                                    over looks the scenery around the
                                                                                    coast. This is the seventh geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is Rin's
                                                                                    seventh geospot.

locations.name: Dogashima Shokudo
locations.description:
This is where the group ate
                                                                                    breakfast. They bought a Seafood
                                                                                    Bowl with Sashimi and more. Akari
                                                                                    had Tokoroten.

locations.name: Dogashima Observatory
locations.description:
This is where the group viewed the
                                                                                    string of islands and the coastline.
                                                                                    The view from this observatory is
                                                                                    amazing and it's worth taking images
                                                                                    of.

locations.name: Dougashima Sea Cave Skylight
locations.description:
Known asTensoudou, it is a
                                                                                    designated National Natural Monument
                                                                                    and it can be viewed from the
                                                                                    promenade or from a sightseeing
                                                                                    boat. This is the eighth geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is Rin's eighth
                                                                                    geospot and the fourth geospot of
                                                                                    Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Tombolo Land Bridge
locations.description:
This land bridge is crossable during
                                                                                    low tide which makes the Sanshirou
                                                                                    Islands accessible by foot. Akari was misled by Aoi thinking that
                                                                                    Tombolo is some sort of food. Aoi
                                                                                    had to buy Akari some food later on
                                                                                    for misleading her.

locations.name: Sanshirou Island
locations.description:
The island is called Sanshirou
                                                                                    because depending on the direction
                                                                                    and time you at the islands, you can
                                                                                    see three islands, more or less. This is the ninth geospot featured in
                                                                                    the season and it is Rin's ninth
                                                                                    geospot and the fifth geospot of
                                                                                    Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Food Store Aoki, Nishiizu
locations.description:
This is where the group bought
                                                                                    supplies for their campsite dinner
                                                                                    later in the day. Rin drove in front
                                                                                    of Toba-sensi's car to enjoy the
                                                                                    feeling of driving on the West Izu
                                                                                    Skyline.

locations.name: West Izu Skyline
locations.description:
Rin drove through the road with an
                                                                                    impressive view of the sky and the
                                                                                    the area below. It is a well-known
                                                                                    tourist destination.

locations.name: Mt. Daruma Observatory
locations.description:
Rin walked down the staircase and
                                                                                    views the Ryugu Sea Cave from
                                                                                    inside. It is a highland formed by the
                                                                                    eruption of Mt. Daruma. You can see
                                                                                    Mt. Fuji with an amazing foreground
                                                                                    of the terrain from this
                                                                                    observatory. This is the tenth geospot featured in
                                                                                    the season and it is Rin's tenth
                                                                                    geospot and the sixth geospot of
                                                                                    Toba-sensei's group.

locations.name: Darumayamakogen Camping Ground
locations.description:
This is where the group spent the
                                                                                    night and it is also where Operation
                                                                                    Shrimp for Nadeshiko and Aoi's
                                                                                    birthday went into action.

locations.name: Cape Mihama
locations.description:
The cape is a sand pit formed by
                                                                                    coastal currents and it also serves
                                                                                    as a natural defense against strong
                                                                                    weather. This is the eleventh geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is the seventh
                                                                                    geospot for Nadeshiko, Aoi, Akari,
                                                                                    and Toba-sensei who drove here while
                                                                                    Operation Shrimp was in progress.

locations.name: Cape Deai Observation Deck
locations.description:
This observation deck is where
                                                                                    Nadeshiko, Aoi, Akari, and
                                                                                    Toba-sensei viewed the entirety of
                                                                                    Cape Mihama.

locations.name: Daruma Mountain Plateau
locations.description:
This is where the group waited for
                                                                                    the sunrise with the exception of
                                                                                    Akari who was asleep in the car and
                                                                                    Toba-sensei who was with Akari
                                                                                    inside the car. Series merch and promotion available
                                                                                    here!

locations.name: Mount Omuro Climbing Chairlifts
locations.description:
Rin and Nadeshiko bought some ice
                                                                                    cream here before they got on the
                                                                                    lift to the top of Mt. Omuro. There is a camera that takes souvenir
                                                                                    photos of people riding the lift.
                                                                                    Make sure to smile when you see it!

locations.name: Mount Omuro
locations.description:
It is the largest scoria cone in the
                                                                                    eastern Izu volcano group and a
                                                                                    designated as a National Natural
                                                                                    Monument. A controlled burn happens
                                                                                    here every second Sunday of February
                                                                                    each year. This is the twelfth geospot featured
                                                                                    in the season and it is Rin's
                                                                                    eleventh geospot, Nadeshiko, Aoi,
                                                                                    Akari, and Toba-sensei's eighth
                                                                                    geospot, and the seventh geospot for
                                                                                    everyone else.

locations.name: Yatsugatake Jizoson
locations.description:
It was built in 1984 from the
                                                                                    donations of locals for the safety
                                                                                    of the fishing industry and good
                                                                                    catches.

locations.name: Mount Omuro Running Challenge Goal
locations.description:
This is the goal of Nadeshiko and
                                                                                    Akari's running competition. This a
                                                                                    great observation point that
                                                                                    overlooks the surroundings.

locations.name: Mt. Omuro - Mt. Fuji Observatory
locations.description:
This location is where the group took
                                                                                    a photo with the Mt. Omuro sign with
                                                                                    Mt. Fuji in the background.

locations.name:
Izu Cactus Park Rhesus Macaque No.1
                                                                                    Parking Lot
locations.description:
This is the parking lot for the Izu
                                                                                    Shaboten Zoo. The entrance to the
                                                                                    Izu Shaboten Zoo can be found here.

locations.name: Izu Shaboten Zoo
locations.description:
This zoo features a capybara onsen
                                                                                    which is the reason why Akari joined
                                                                                    the Izu camping trip. There are also
                                                                                    many other animals featured in the
                                                                                    anime.
